title: target host
extract: Target host or target server AAA is not defined in an operation. Dear SAP Experts, I got this error message "Target host or target server yhsappj_YP8_23 is not defined in an operation type. " when I try to perform SM36 (define background job) for daily scheduling.
extract_html: Target host or target server AAA is not defined in an operation. Dear SAP Experts, I got this error message "Target host or target server yhsappj_YP8_23 is not defined in an operation type. " when I try to perform SM36 (define background job) for daily scheduling.
